description.value:
Trigger A creature or hazard would deal sonic damage to you.

You can manipulate the acoustics around you to deflect sonic damage back at its source. Attempt a Performance check against the @Check[type:performance|defense:will]{Will DC} of the creature or @Check[type:performance|defense:fortitude]{Fortitude DC} of a hazard. If the damage came from a spell, use the creature's spell DC if it's lower.

Critical Success You reduce the triggering damage by an amount up to four times your level. The creature takes sonic damage equal to the amount of damage you reduced in this way.

Success As critical success, but you reduce the triggering damage by an amount up to twice your level.
